Mr Nadella was previously a senior vice president, leading engineering efforts in the company's online services division. He is a 19-year Microsoft veteran. Data Integration: Moving

A 19-year Microsoft veteran, Satya Nadella has "the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops," Microsoft Chief Executive Steve Ballmer said in a memo to employees, which was made public. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways, Steve Ballmer said. Rep. Mike Pence arrived at Columbus in his east-central Indiana district for a town hall meeting, the sort of event that usually attracted a few dozen constituents. Surprised to see the hallway outside the room crowded with people, their arms folded and brows furrowed, Mike Pence shouted down the hall to an aide, asking him to get a janitor to open the room.
